context.p: To modify the generated text for WebHelp transformation you need to create a DITA-OT extension plugin that uses the dita.xsl.messages extension point. The next procedure is for changing English labels, but you can adapt it for any language.

step.cmd: Create the com.oxygenxml.webhelp.localization plugin directory in the /plugins/ location.
Create a plugin.xml in the directory created in the previous step with the following content:
Create the webhelp-extension-strings.xml file with the following content:

Copy the strings you want to change from the translation files to the strings-en-us.xml file. Make sure you leave the name attribute unchanged, because this is the key used to look up the string. A sample content might be:

info.codeblock: <strings xml:lang="en-US"> <str name="Figure">Fig</str> <str name="Draft comment">ADDRESS THIS DRAFT COMMENT</str> </strings>
